tooltip.relics.relic.tooltip.table: You may learn more about this relic on the Researching Table.
tooltip.relics.relic.ability.tooltip.low: To use you need to increase level of the relic to %1$s %2$s.
tooltip.relics.relic.ability.tooltip.no_: This ability has no upgradeable stats and does not affect the quality of the relic.
tooltip.relics.relic.upgrade.locked: Ability has reached its max level.
tooltip.relics.relic.reset.locked: To use you need to level-up this ability at least 1 time.
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.leveling: +1 experience point for each piece eaten from the ability «Regeneration».
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.ability.auto: Using a relic consumes one of the regeneratable charges, replenishing the hunger of the wearer.
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.ability.infu: Using a potion on the relic in the inventory, remembers its effect by spending the potion. Subsequent use of the «Regeneration», ability will impose a summable effect of the associated potion on the wearer. In the complete absence of charges, relic loses the properties of the associated potion.
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.leveling: +1 experience point for using the ability «Edge Transposition» +1 experience point for every 10 blocks from the distance to the target when using.
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.ability.neutr: Makes endermen neutral with respect to the wearer.
Swaps the wearer with the target along the line of sight.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.leveling: +1 experience point for each activation of the ability «Divine Blessing» +1 experience point for each stolen healing unit.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.steal: Redirects part of the regenerated health of nearby creatures to the wearer of the relic.
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.leveling: +1 experience point for each use of the «Wormhole» ability +1 experience point for every 50 blocks to the teleportation point.
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.ability.tele: After use, teleports the wearer to his respawn point.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.leveling: +1 experience point for every 2 glaive bounces from the «Blind Justice» ability.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.ability.gla: Usage releases one of 8 glaive charges bouncing between nearby targets. The missing charges are restored themselves after a certain time.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.ability.saw: Usage consumes all 8 glaive charges, summoning a saw that deals damage to nearby targets. Reuse will return the saw to the wearer, restoring all charges. Automatic charge regeneration is blocked while the ability is active.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.leveling: +1 experience point for every 10 blocks to the target hit by the shot.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.rece: Archery primarily uses arrows from the quiver's internal storage. Pressing the LMB arrow on the quiver in the inventory will place it in the internal storage of the relic. Pressing the RMB on the quiver will get the last stack of arrows placed in it.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.leap: Knocks the player away from the looking direction, inflicting a vanishing effect until landing. Using a bow will suspend the player in mid-air, increasing damage and nullifying gravity for the next critical shot.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.agil: Increases the speed of bowstring tension.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.rain: Calls on a point along the line of sight an area of falling homing arrows from the internal quiver storage from the «Arrow Storage» ability. The arrows themselves from the storage are not consumed. Only one area from this ability can exist at a time.
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.leveling: +1 experience point for every 5 seconds of flight within the scope of the ability «Eternal Fire».
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.ability.bon: Using a relic on a block will create a restricted flight zone, the size of which depends on the amount of fire in a certain radius around the center.
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.leveling: +1 experience point for every 10 seconds of burning fuel when placing it in the internal buffer of the relic from the ability «Acceleration».
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.ability.bo: Using any combustible fuel on a relic in the inventory replenishes its internal buffer.Using the ability during the flight on elytra rushes the wearer forward, consuming fuel from the internal buffer.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.leveling: +1 experience point for every 2 units of damage when attacking from invisibility from the «Disappearing» ability.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.van: Gives the wearer complete invisibility and increases the speed of his movement at a sufficiently low light level.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.bac: An attack from the «Vanish» ability deals increased damage, outlining a circle around the target and dispelling the invisibility effect of the wearer. Reuse of the «Vanish» ability is possible only after the wearer leaves the circle.
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.level: +1 experience point for every 10 damage accumulated in the internal buffer of the relic from the ability «Infernal Hatred».
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.abili: Accumulates the damage received by the wearer into the internal buffer of the relic. 5 seconds after the last damage or in case of buffer overflow, the relic explodes, throwing obsidian fragments in all directions, causing damage and stunning targets.
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.leveli: +1 experience point for each activation of the ability «Electric Discharge».
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.abilit: The wearer does not sink in water.
Deals damage to targets when colliding with them.
When the ability is triggered, «Electric Discharge» imposes a paralysis effect on the target.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.leveling:
+1 experience point for each spore released by the «Poison Synthesis» ability.
+1 experience point for each additional spore split by the «Decomposition» ability.
When taking damage, throws a spore in a random direction that sticks to surfaces and explodes when a target approaches, dealing damage, poisoning, slowing, and blocking healing for 5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.buffer: Each time the «Poison Synthesis» ability cooldown triggers, accumulates one charge into the relic's internal buffer that can be used by other abilities to release spores. Adds a chance not to consume spores from the internal buffer when requesting charges for other abilities.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.multip: Each spore can split into several smaller spores within a given range when it explodes. The maximum number of spores is determined by the degree of the main spore size, but the final number is limited by the first unsuccessful chance of spore division.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.explos: Empties the relic's buffer, releasing all accumulated spore charges into the world. The size of the released spores depends on the wearer's missing health.
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.leveling: +1 experience point for every 3 blocks in the fall before triggering the ability «Earthquake».
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.ability.susta: Increases the speed of falling, increases the knocknback resistance and removes blocks slippering.
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.ability.impac: Using the ability in a fall will create a shockwave at the landing site, causing damage and throwing away nearby targets. Power of the wave depends on the distance that the wearer has flown.
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.leveling:
+1/5/10 experience point for each killed Zombie Piglin/Piglin/Piglin Brute.
+1 experience point for each additional trade from the ability «Respect».
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.comp: Makes piglins neutral in relation to the wearer. The nearest piglin will indicate the location of the bastion nearby.
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.trad: Each trade with piglins gets a multiple chance of 50% to issue an additional trading result.
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.leveling: +1 experience point for every 25 blocks overcome by a horse called by the ability «Portable Stall».
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.ability.paddo: Using a relic on the horse will move the animal to the internal storage. Reuse will release the creature. If the distance between wearer and summoned horse exceeds 16 blocks, it will automatically fit back into the flute.
A horse placed in internal storage will slowly restore health.
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.leveling: +1 experience point for every 5 units of heating from the ability «Fiery Tread».
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.ability.pace: For a certain time allows you to walk on the lava surface without falling and not taking damage. After the time limit expires, the boots begin to overheat and cause damage to the wearer proportional to the degree of overheating.
tooltip.relics.aqua_walker.leveling: +1 experience point for every 5 units of getting wet from the ability «Moisture Resistance».
tooltip.relics.aqua_walker.ability.walki: For a certain time allows you to move on the surface of the water without falling. After the time limit expires, the boots begin to sink, dragging their wearer with them under the water.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.leveling: +1 experience point for each level of enchantment «Riptide» on the trident when using it.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.slot: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipment relics.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.anch: Reduces the swimming speed and increases the sinking speed of the wearer.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.ript: Allows you to use the trident «Riptide» ability without rain or water, adding recharge time to it.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.leveling: +1 experience point for each attack made by the wearer's pet.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.ability.slots: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipping relics.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.ability.train: Increases the damage inflicted by the wearer's pets.
tooltip.relics.leather_belt.leveling: +1 experience point for each experience gained by equipped talismans.
tooltip.relics.leather_belt.ability.slot: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipping relics.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.leveling:
+1 experience point for every 3 charges from the ability «Berserker Rage» when they are reset.
+1 experience point for each target hit by the «Spurt» ability.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.rage.d: Each wearer attack made within 3 seconds after the last one accumulates 1 charge into the internal buffer of the relic. The damage inflicted and received by the wearer, as well as its movement speed and dealt damage increases in proportion to the accumulated charges. After 3 seconds, the internal buffer of the relic is emptied, canceling all bonuses received.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.phlebo: Increases the wearer's attack and movement speed, as well as grants passive regeneration proportional to the percentage of missing health.
Dashes towards the direction of sight, setting on fire, applying bleeding and attacking each target in its path with the item in the hand. Deals additional damage proportional to the number of charges in the relic's internal buffer from the «Berserker's Rage» ability and devastates it.
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.leveling: +1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the ability «Skating».
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.skatin: Increases the speed of movement on the ice depending on the duration of sliding.
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.ram.de: When colliding with targets, deals damage proportional to the duration of «Skating» ability usage.
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.leveling: +1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the ability «Fins».
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.ability.sw: Accelerates the speed of swimming depending on its duration.
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.leveling: +1 experience point for each second of return from the ability «Time rift».
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.ability.seal: When used, returns the wearer along the route traveled during a certain time. Repeated use will terminate the ability.
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.leveling: +1 experience point for every 10 blocks to the teleportation point from the «Teleportation Control» ability.
Using the chorus fruit teleports the wearer to the block along the line of sight within reach.
tooltip.relics.wool_mitten.leveling: +1 experience point for every 5 units of size when hit by a snowball from the ability «Mold».
Collecting snow on the RMB with an empty hand gradually forms special solid snowballs. Hitting such a snowball on the target will cause damage and stun it, as well as freeze targets nearby. Holding a snowball without an equipped relic also freezes the wearer.
tooltip.relics.roller_skates.leveling: +1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the ability «Acceleration».
tooltip.relics.roller_skates.ability.ska: Increases the speed of movement depending on its duration. All blocks become slippery for the wearer.
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.leveling: +1 experience point for each created portal if there is no existing one
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.ability.d: Holding RMB creates a portal on a point along the line of sight, stopping holding RMB creates a second portal along the same principle, linking it to the first one. Bringing a living creature to one of the portals will move it to the linked portal. Portals don't work if there are any solid blocks in their path.
command.relics.base.not_relic: Item in hand must be a relic!
